author: wn.com
title: J. Todd Billings Calls Church to Face Death as Witness to Resurrection Hope (Trinity International ...
text: ( Source : Trinity International University ) Dr. J . Todd Billings made the case last Wednesday morning that the church has watered down the resurrection hope of Christ by complying with a youth-obsessed, death-denying Western culture .
